column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The problem is that it's impossible to find your way around.  Even getting out can be tricky
column2: depending on what wing you're in.  The maps in the visitor guide do not particularly help.  The staff - security guards?  docents?  I don't know - try to help
column3: but giving directions around the place is so complicated that it's hard to understand where and why to go.
